welcome.title: Explore Sergipe's highways and discover amazing stories
welcome.subtitle: Every highway has a story to tell. TURoad automatically activates unique stories, legends, tales and memories from those who live and made history here.

login.title: Welcome back
login.noAccount: Don't have an account yet? Create account

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.subtitle: Please enter the email used in your registration. We will send an email with instructions for you to create a new password.

home.title: TURoad
home.searchPlaceholder: Find stories, routes, events and more...
home.description: Travel through cities that preserve the origins, struggles and traditions of the Sergipe people.
home.searchCity: Search for another city or region
home.searchCityPlaceholder: Search for another city or region
home.aracajuDescription: Capital of Sergipe, Aracaju combines modernity with coastal tranquility. Known for its organized waterfront, seafood-based cuisine and welcoming lifestyle, the city attracts tourists and residents for its quality of life and urban infrastructure.

explore.title: Explore
explore.transcription: You are in Aracaju between the blue of the sea and the green of the mangroves, Aracaju pulses with simplicity and human warmth. Planned for
explore.nextLocation: Next location on your route 3km away

routes.title: Tourist routes
routes.memoryDescription: Travel through cities that preserve the origins, struggles and traditions of the Sergipe people.
routes.betweenChurches: Between Churches and Empire: Living Past of Sergipe
routes.betweenChurchesDescription: From baroque altars to colonial mansions, explore cities that preserve the historical soul of Sergipe. Each stone, a memory of time.
routes.oldChico: Old Chico Paths: Nature and Riverside Life
routes.betweenMangoes: Between Mangroves and Canyons: Wild Landscapes of Sergipe

route.title: Historical Route: Sergipe Memory Paths
route.description: Travel through cities that preserve the origins, struggles and traditions of the Sergipe people. This route connects colonial churches, historic centers, museums and centenary festivals — offering visitors a deep immersion in the state's cultural identity.
route.saoCristovaoDescription: First capital of Sergipe and fourth oldest city in Brazil, it is a colonial treasure recognized by UNESCO.

city.title: Aracaju
city.introduction: Introduction to the city of Aracaju
city.cityDescription: The City That Was Born Planned
city.observeDescription: Vibrant Central Market, urban art on walls, poetry in squares, and the iconic Casa do Cantador — a living center of northeastern culture in the heart of DF.

language.title: Language
language.changeAnytime: You can change the language anytime and also directly from the player.

helpCenter.title: Help and contact
helpCenter.contactDescription: Have any questions, suggestions or found a problem in the app?
helpCenter.faqDescription: Find quick answers on how to use TURoad

notifications.title: Notification settings
notifications.activeRouteDescription: Receive updates while traveling a route, such as stop alerts, local tips and nearby points of interest.
notifications.travelTipsDescription: Personalized suggestions based on your previous routes, interests and current location.
notifications.nearbyEventsDescription: Notifications about cultural events, fairs and attractions happening near you.
notifications.narrativesDescription: Notifications when new narrative or historical content is available on your route.
notifications.localOffersDescription: Promotions from establishments and partners in the cities or places you visit.
